QuestData.Title: Huln's War - Malorne's Favored
QuestData.Description:
[In broken Common] Shan'do ask for you. Sent Eche'ro beast with message on rack.
Unng Ak hear Eche'ro sound fighting. You find beast? Give help, maybe feathered night elf be relieve.
QuestData.RewardText: <Eche'ro looks up briefly, then lowers its head before you. This creature is thankful for your aid.>
